#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include <iostream>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<utility>
#include<cassert>
using namespace std;
 
#define REP(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)
 
int main(){
  int N, mode, x;
  int sz;
  priority_queue<int> up, down;
 
  assert( scanf("%d",&N)==1 );
  assert(1 <= N && N <= 250000);
 
  sz = 0;
  while(N--){
    scanf("%d",&mode);
    if(mode == 1){
      scanf("%d", &x);
      sz++;
      	if (!up.empty()) {
		if (x > -up.top()) {	
			up.push(-x);
		} else {
			down.push(x);
		}
	} else {
		up.push(-x);
	}
	//cout << "sa" << endl;
	if (!up.empty() && !down.empty()) {
	if (-up.top() < down.top()) {
		int x1 = -up.top();
		int x2 = down.top();
		up.pop();
		down.pop();
		up.push(-x2);
		down.push(x1);
	}
	}

	while (up.size() < sz/3) {
		up.push(-down.top());
		down.pop();
	}

	while (up.size() > sz/3) {
		down.push(-up.top());
		up.pop();
	}
    } else {
      if(sz / 3 == 0) puts("No reviews yet");
      else            printf("%d\n", -up.top());
    }
  }
 
  return 0;
}
